fw.name: CATRscInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

method.name: GetOrigin
method.abstract: Returns the coordinates of the origin of the environment.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the environment type.

method.name: GetVerticalAxis
method.abstract: Returns the coordinates of the vertical axis vector of the environment.

method.name: GetWall
method.abstract: Returns the environment walls.

method.name: PutOrigin
method.abstract: Sets the coordinates of the origin of the environment.

method.name: PutVerticalAxis
method.abstract: Sets the coordinates of the vertical axis vector of the environment.

method.name: ActiveStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the environment active status.

method.name: FaceNumber
method.abstract: Returns or sets the spherical environment face number.

method.name: Height
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cubic or cylindrical environment height value.

method.name: Length
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cubic environment length value.

method.name: Radius
method.abstract: Returns or sets the spherical or cylindrical environment radius value.

method.name: Width
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cubic environment width value.

method.name: FitAllInWall
method.abstract: If a texture is mapped on the wall, scale automatically the texture to fit inside the wall.

method.name: ActiveStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the environment wall active status.

method.name: AutoScaleStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture automatic scaling status.

method.name: FlipUStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets texture orientation status along the U axis.

method.name: FlipVStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets texture orientation status along the V axis.

method.name: LinkedScaleStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture scaling link status.

method.name: Rotation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture rotation angle (in degrees).

method.name: ScaleU
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture scale along the U axis.

method.name: ScaleV
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture scale along the V axis.

method.name: ShadowsStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the wall shadow status.

method.name: Texture
method.abstract: Returns or sets the wall texture name.

method.name: TranslationU
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture offset along the U axis.

method.name: TranslationV
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture offset along the V axis.

class.name: RenderingEnvironments
class.abstract: A collection of all the Rendering Environments objects.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a new environment to the environments collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns an environment index in the environments collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a environment from the environments collection.

method.name: RemoveAll
method.abstract: Removes all environments.

method.name: GetColor
method.abstract: Returns the color of a light.

method.name: GetOrigin
method.abstract: Returns the coordinates of the origin of the light.

method.name: GetShadowColor
method.abstract: Returns the color of a shadow.

method.name: GetTarget
method.abstract: Returns the coordinates of the target point of the light.

method.name: PutColor
method.abstract: Sets the color of a light.

method.name: PutOrigin
method.abstract: Sets the coordinates of the origin of the light.

method.name: PutShadowColor
method.abstract: Sets the color of a shadow.

method.name: PutTarget
method.abstract: Sets the coordinates of the target point of the light.

method.name: ActiveStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light active status.

method.name: Ambient
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light ambient intensity of a light.

method.name: Angle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light angle of a spot light.

method.name: AreaSamplesU
method.abstract: Changes the number of samples taken in U direction of the area source.

method.name: AreaSamplesV
method.abstract: Changes the number of samples taken in V direction of the area source.

method.name: AreaStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light area visibility status.

method.name: AttenuationAngleRatio
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light attenuation angle ratio.

method.name: AttenuationStartRatio
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light attenuation start ratio.

method.name: CausticPhotonsNumber
method.abstract: Changes the maximum number of caustic photons to emit from the light source.

method.name: CylinderLightHeight
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cylinder light area radius.

method.name: CylinderLightRadius
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cylinder light area radius.

method.name: Diffuse
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light diffuse intensity of a light.

method.name: DiskLightRadius
method.abstract: Returns or sets the disk light area radius.

method.name: EndDistance
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light maximum distance of illumination.

method.name: EnergyFactor
method.abstract: Changes the factor for indirect illumination energy.

method.name: FalloffExponent
method.abstract: Changes the light falloff exponent.

method.name: GlobalPhotonsNumber
method.abstract: Changes the maximum number of global illumination photons to emit from the light source.

method.name: HardwareShadowSmoothing
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light shadow smoothing.

method.name: HardwareShadowStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light shadow status on environmemt.

method.name: HardwareShadowTransparency
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light shadow transparency.

method.name: IlluminationStatus
method.abstract: Changes the indirect illumination status.

method.name: Intensity
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light intensity of a light.

method.name: LightAreaType
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light area type.

method.name: Mode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light mode.

method.name: RectangleLightLength
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light area length.

method.name: RectangleLightWidth
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light area width.

method.name: ShadowFittingMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light shadow fitting mode.

method.name: ShadowMapSize
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light shadow map size.

method.name: ShadowObjectStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light shadow status on objet.

method.name: ShadowStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light shadow status.

method.name: Specular
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light specular intensity of a light.

method.name: SphereLightRadius
method.abstract: Returns or sets the sphere light area radius.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Returns or sets the light type.

class.name: RenderingLights
class.abstract: A collection of all the Rendering Lights objects.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a new light to the lights collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a rendering light index in the rendering light collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a light from the lights collection.

method.name: RemoveAll
method.abstract: Removes all lights from the collection.

method.name: AddActiveLight
method.abstract: Adds a new active light to the shooting active lights list.

method.name: CountActiveLights
method.abstract: Returns the number of active light for the shooting.

method.name: GetActiveLight
method.abstract: Returns the active light of the shooting using its index.

method.name: RemoveActiveLight
method.abstract: Removes a light from the shootings active lights list.

method.name: Render
method.abstract:
Render the shooting
Caution: Product involved in rendering calculation should not be closed before the end of computation.

method.name: ActiveCamera
method.abstract: Returns or sets the active camera for shooting.

method.name: ActiveEnvironment
method.abstract: Returns or sets the active environment for shooting.

method.name: AmbientFactor
method.abstract: Returns or sets amount of ambient used for indirect illumination (final gathering or global illumination).

method.name: AntialiasingContrast
method.abstract: Returns or sets the antialiasing contrast threshold value.

method.name: AntialiasingMaxSample
method.abstract: Returns or sets the antialiasing maximum sample number for image computation.

method.name: AntialiasingMinSample
method.abstract: Returns or sets the antialiasing minimum sample number for image computation.

method.name: CartoonContourThickness
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cartoon contour thickness.

method.name: CartoonShadingStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cartoon shading status of shooting.

method.name: CartoonStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cartoon status of shooting.

method.name: CartoonStrokeStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cartoon stroke status of shooting.

method.name: CausticAccuracy
method.abstract: Returns or sets the number of photons to use when estimating radiance for caustics.

method.name: CausticRadius
method.abstract: Returns or sets the maximum distance in which photons for caustics are located.

method.name: CausticStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the caustic status of shooting.

method.name: DepthOfFieldRadius
method.abstract: Returns or sets the depth of field radius of confusion.

method.name: DepthOfFieldStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the depth of field status of shooting.

method.name: FinalGatheringAccuracy
method.abstract: Returns or sets the number of rays shot in each final gather.

method.name: FinalGatheringMaxRadius
method.abstract: Returns or sets the maximum distance in which a final gather result can be used.

method.name: FinalGatheringMinRadius
method.abstract: Returns or sets the minimum distance in which a final gather result can be used.

method.name: FinalGatheringStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the final gathering status of shooting.

method.name: GlobalIlluminationAccuracy
method.abstract: Returns or sets the number of photons to use when estimating radiance for global illumination.

method.name: GlobalIlluminationRadius
method.abstract: Returns or sets the maximum distance in which photons for global illumination are located.

method.name: GlobalIlluminationStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the global illumination status of shooting.

method.name: GlowFlareDiffusion
method.abstract: Returns or sets the glow flare diffusion.

method.name: GlowFlareFactor
method.abstract: Returns or sets the glow flare factor.

method.name: GlowIntensity
method.abstract: Returns or sets the glow intensity factor.

method.name: GlowRadialLineSize
method.abstract: Returns or sets the glow radial lines size.

method.name: GlowSize
method.abstract: Returns or sets the glow filter size in percentage of image size.

method.name: GlowStarEffect
method.abstract: Returns or sets the glow star effect.

method.name: GlowStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the glow status of shooting.

method.name: GlowThreshold
method.abstract: Returns or sets the glow color threshold.

method.name: ImageHeight
method.abstract: Returns or sets the image height for shooting.

method.name: ImageOutputDirectory
method.abstract: Returns or sets the output directory for image.

method.name: ImageOutputFormat
method.abstract: Returns or sets the file type used for saved image.

method.name: ImageOutputName
method.abstract: Returns or sets the output name for image (extension excluded).

method.name: ImageOutputType
method.abstract: Returns or sets the image output location.

method.name: ImagePredefinedRatio
method.abstract: Returns or sets the image height for shooting.

method.name: ImageWidth
method.abstract: Returns or sets the image width for shooting.

method.name: RaytracingStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the the raytracing status for shooting.

method.name: ReboundsCount
method.abstract: Returns or sets the maximum number of rebounds levels to take into account for image computation.

method.name: ReflectionsCount
method.abstract: Returns or sets the maximum number of reflections levels to take into account for image computation.

method.name: RefractionsCount
method.abstract: Returns or sets the maximum number of refractions levels to take into account for image computation.

method.name: ShadowsStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the shadows status of shooting.

method.name: TexturesStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the textures status of shooting.

class.name: RenderingShootings
class.abstract: A collection of all the Rendering Shootings objects.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a new shooting to the shootings collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a renderingshooting index in the renderingshootings collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a shooting from the shootings collection.

method.name: RemoveAll
method.abstract: Removes all shootings from the collection.
